Still a great game even 2 years after the launch of cs:go...

For those who cannot handle "all the time" the pressure and adrenaline related to top fps games like this one, there are a lot of other amazing mods with less pressure but greater fun too... Climbing, Bhop, football, scout, multigames, Zombiez... 

My favorite is the last one, even if surviving isnt that easy, the big danger won't come as you might think from the ennemy , ie: zombiez, but from noob CTs especially the edgers (the worst thing is that they never learn from their mistakes o.O)... so beware, you've been warned !!! With nearly 400 hours up my belt i have come to a conclusion that this game is amazing! I could even say that its better then CSGO!

Эх, ностальгия, ностальгия...
А, о чём это я? Неважно, приступаем. CS:S - игра моего нынешнего детства. было время полгода назад - я сидел в ней с 7:00 по 21:00 с маленькими перерывами. В эту игру, думаю, играли все без исключения, а пацаны моего села - точно!!!
Что насчёт графона - это тема старая, по сравнению с CS:GO просто г, но есть всё же здесь своя характерная черта - читы.
Читы,читы, как же без них. Я не читер, но вот высоко прыгать и быстро бегать - не проблема, так как у меня стоит расса нежить. Что такое рассы? Что ж, расскажу и об этом. Рассы,рассы... нууу, это такая штука, которая даёт тебе некоторое приемушество перед врагами. Высокий прыжок например, востановление, нивидемость... вобщем с рассами не скучно и их более 3600. И каждая доступна для использования. Так что покупайте данную игру без оговорочно. Что ж, что - то я болтаю и болтаю, пора ставить оценку.
Оценка: 10 из 10.
Вся серия Counter-Strike просто бесподобна, играю с 6 лет, но соурс больше всего понраву

I hate people, you know, not the type of hate that you have for a exbestfriend, or someone who did you wrong. No, it's a misanthropic hate. I seem to be engulfed by humans who have no perception of reality. They don't perceive emotions, rationality, empathy. None of these things, just a grotesque narcissism, that cannot be cured- no that wont be cured. You could cull the herd, and still this anomalous behavior will show up. How can you be so redundant? A recurring event that appears every single time, throughout history. The same consistent malignant heart. The pure savagery that wants to consume everything, a spawn of Satan, and hive mind. 

Everything and everyone is just so boring. The good people keep shelter and hide amongst the crowds, only wanting to blend in, but they are sick, the putrid stench of these heathens that walk around with attitudes of greatness, a haughtiness that stabs the pit of your stomach. They want to snuff out the light in the eyes of humble dwellers of society, they want to wipe out what they call weakness. I have to tell you, it's a fight that we are losing, the more this earth turns into a paradise of deviancy, the more chances of being a turncoat. May GOD have forgiveness on our souls. because we are all doomed.

I love this game to death. The only thing I hate is how people say that it got destroyed by CS: GO. I don't know about anyone else, but I prefer Source to Global Offensive. Sure, there are those rounds when you feel like punching through your fucking monitor after getting sniped through a crack in the doorway on de_dust. But you learn, oh dear Lord will you learn. This game will kick your ass for being careless. This game involves a lot of accuracy and strategy. I have one piece of advice: Go for a headshot, always.
Still a great game, although it's hard to find good competition after everyone migrated to CS:GO.
